doc:
John Fiedler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Fiedler 0 John Donald Fiedler (February 3, 1925 – June 25, 2005) was an American actor and voice actor who was slight, balding, and bespectacled, with a distinctive, high-pitched voice. His career lasted more than 55 years in stage, film, television and radio. Among his best-known roles are the nervous Juror #2 in 12 Angry Men; the voice of Piglet in Disney's Winnie-the-Pooh productions; Vinnie, one of Oscar's poker cronies in the film The Odd Couple; the government official Mr. Hengist who gets possessed by the spirit of Jack the Ripper on the Star Trek episode "Wolf in the Fold", and Mr. Emil Peterson, the hen-pecked milquetoast on The Bob Newhart Show. John_Donald_Fiedler ( February_3_,_1925 – June_25_,_2005 ) was an_American_actor_and_voice_actor who was slight , balding , and bespectacled , with a_distinctive_,_high-pitched_voice . His_career lasted more_than_55_years in stage_,_film_,_television_and_radio . Among his_best-known_roles are the_nervous_Juror_#_2 in 12_Angry_Men ; the_voice of Piglet in Disney 's_Winnie-the-Pooh_productions ; Vinnie , one of Oscar 's_poker_cronies in the_film The_Odd_Couple ; the_government official_Mr._Hengist who gets_possessed by the_spirit of Jack the_Ripper on the_Star_Trek_episode " Wolf in the_Fold_" , and Mr._Emil_Peterson , the_hen-pecked_milquetoast on The_Bob_Newhart_Show .
